com.mindfusion.charting

Class Renderer2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.charting.SeriesRenderer
      • com.mindfusion.charting.Renderer2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataChangedListener, SeriesContainer, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnnotationRenderer, AreaRenderer, BarOverlayRenderer, BarRenderer, BubbleRenderer, CandlestickRenderer, LineRenderer, ScatterRenderer, StackRenderer, StepAreaRenderer, StepRenderer

    public class Renderer2D
extends SeriesRenderer
    A base class for series renderers that draw in two dimensional Cartesian coordinate system.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static interface  Renderer2D.ProcessPoint
      Defines the signature of lambdas called to process a data point one element at a time.
      protected static interface  Renderer2D.ProcessRange
      Defines the signature of lambdas called to process all points from current data range at once.

      • getPixel

        protected java.awt.geom.Point2D getPixel(int seriesIndex,
                                         int dataIndex,
                                         Axis xAxis,
                                         Axis yAxis,
                                         com.mindfusion.charting.components.Component component)
        Gets the coordinates of specified data item when mapped to a Plot2D pixel.
        Parameters:
        seriesIndex - An integer index of a Series within the list of series rendered by this Renderer2D.
        dataIndex - An integer index of the data item in specified series.
        xAxis - An Axis reference specifying the X axis.
        yAxis - An Axis reference specifying the Y axis.
        component - An instance of Plot2D or derived class.
        Returns:
        A Point2D containing Plot2D coordinates corresponding to specified data item.

      • getPixel

        protected java.awt.geom.Point2D getPixel(double valueX,
                                         Axis xAxis,
                                         double valueY,
                                         Axis yAxis,
                                         com.mindfusion.charting.components.Component component)
        Gets the coordinates of specified data item when mapped to a Plot2D pixel.
        Parameters:
        valueX - The X value of data item in logical coordinate system.
        xAxis - The X Axis from which logical value is mapped to plot's actual width.
        valueY - The Y value of data item in logical coordinate system.
        yAxis - The Y Axis from which logical value is mapped to plot's actual height.
        component - An instance of Plot2D or derived class.
        Returns:
        A Point2D containing Plot2D coordinates corresponding to specified data item.
